rules_text:
Reach
When Kilocorn Grandeps enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to each battle and planeswalker, where X is the number of creatures that attacked this turn.
{G}{G}{G}: Return Kilocorn Grandeps from your graveyard to the battlefield transformed.
rules_text2:
The first time each turn a creature you control deals excess damage, you may have that creature fight another target creature. [i](Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)[/i]
{4}, {T}: Transform Grandeps' Grave. It gains “When this card would be put into a graveyard from anywhere exile it instead.”
